content: chibi fluffy alpaca pattern by floranfetamina©2020 from la pandustria ©this pattern is for personal use only since it s a free pattern you can t sell it in any manners just share it you can sell the finished product made from this pattern giving credit to la pandustria or floranfetamina as a designer 1 materials light yarns raw light brown a color of election for the tassels 2 little pieces of black and pink yarn for the face details hook size 2 5mm tapestry needle toy stuffing safety eyes size 6 mm finish size 2 4 inches abbreviations magic_ring=magic_ring chain = chain st=stitch single_crochet = single_crochet blo = back loop only flo= front loop only increase= increase decrease= decrease number in at the end of each round or row indicates the total number of stitches that should be in that round or row let start muzzle and face with raw yarn round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 1 single_crochet 1 increase x 3 9 round 3 single_crochet around 9 round 4 2 single_crochet 1 increase x 6 12 round 5 3 single_crochet 1 increase x6 15 fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing attach safety eyes between round 4-5 approximately 5 stitches apart stuff head lightly embroider a y shaped for the muzzle 2 body and head with light brown yarn round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 working in flo *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 6 round 3 working in blo increase in all 6 st 12 round 4 working in flo *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 12 round 5 working in blo 1 single_crochet 1 increase x 6 18 round 6 working in flo *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 18 round 7 working in blo 2 single_crochet 1 increase x 6 24 round 8 working in flo *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 24 round 9 working in blo *single_crochet around* 24 round 10-11 repeat round 8 and 9 round 12 working in flo *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 24 round 13 working in blo 2 single_crochet 1 decrease x 6 18 round 14 single_crochet around 18 round 15 working in flo *chain 4 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 18 round 16 working in blo *single_crochet around* 18 round 17 single_crochet around 18 round 18 working in flo *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 18 round 19 working in blo 1 single_crochet 1 decrease x 6 12 round 20 single_crochet around 12 round 21 working in flo *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 12 round 22 working in blo *single_crochet around* 12 round 23 single_crochet around 12 round 24 as round 21 round 25 working in blo 1 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing after closing the ring join with a slip_stitch chain 6 and slip_stitch in next stitch 3 ears make 2 with raw yarn round 1 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 round 2-3
